unavailable_apis: getRawInput() as async function (v11, use rawInput property directly)
Shorthand routers (v11 only, must use t.router() calls)
key_features: Transformer (superjson) at client config level, NOT in link
rawInput is a synchronous PROPERTY in middleware: ({ rawInput, ctx, next }) => ...
rawInput is NOT a function — do NOT call getRawInput()
Explicit t.router() calls required for nested routers
Middleware created via t.middleware() with ({ ctx, rawInput, next }) callback
notes: Client function is createTRPCProxyClient, NOT createTRPCClient
transformer: superjson goes at the createTRPCProxyClient({}) level, NOT inside httpBatchLink({})
Middleware uses rawInput directly as a PROPERTY (not a function): ({ rawInput, next }) => ...
Do NOT use getRawInput() — that is a v11 async function that does not exist in v10
SSG helper is createProxySSGHelpers, NOT createSSGHelpers
Subscriptions use wsLink with Observable pattern: observable((emit) => { emit.next(data); return () => cleanup(); })
Nested routes must be wrapped in t.router() calls
initTRPC.context<MyContext>().create() to initialize tRPC with context type
